snippet.title: SAND | Release Date Reveal | Action-packed Multiplayer Mech Action
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1431300/Sand

SAND Launches into Early Access on April 3rd!

Explore a massive, procedurally generated world, survive encounters with rival smugglers, engage in trampler battles and make it off planet with any valuables found throughout the world.

Developed by team Hologryph in Lviv, Ukraine. Support Ukraine - https://u24.gov.ua/

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SANDtheGame/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/sandthegame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sandgamehq/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@sandgamehq
Discord - https://discord.gg/rTCCE8HZD3
Wishlist Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1431300
